      • addJob

        @RequestMapping(value="",
                method=POST)
public Job addJob​(@RequestParam("name")
                  java.lang.String name,
                  @RequestParam("fee")
                  int fee,
                  @RequestParam("category")
                  JobCategory category,
                  @RequestParam("recruiter id")
                  int recruiterId)
           throws RecruiterNotFoundException
        method untuk menambahkan job
        Parameters:
        name - nama pekerjaan
        fee - bonus
        category - kategori job
        recruiterId - id recruiter
        Returns:
        job yang telah dibuat
        Throws:
        RecruiterNotFoundException - recruiter not found
